rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Art Deco styled living room with Vastu-compliant placement towards the south-east for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the Living Room, designed for communal gatherings and maintaining Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen placed in the southeast corner for enhanced energy flow according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Well-ventilated gym area with accessible design and ample storage, located on the ground floor for convenience.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open courtyard that connects all rooms and serves as a ventilation and natural light well, aligning with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Spacious balcony attached to the master bedroom for natural light and Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Art Deco styled master bedroom with a spacious balcony offering south-eastern exposure for Vastu alignment and wheelchair accessible features.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom ensuring ample light, with a dedicated balcony in the eastern direction to promote positive energy flow according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with wheelchair accessible design and north-west exposure for balanced energies.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Fully accessible bathroom with Vastu-compliant placement in the northwest corner.

openings.description: Balcony designed for privacy and natural lighting.
Spacious balcony for ventilation and light.

rooms.name: loft office/study
rooms.description: Versatile space serving as an office or study area, incorporating Art Deco elements with Vastu-compliant north-east placement for creativity.
